name: Dhilly Game 1
description:
The hilarious platformer, Dhilly Game 1, is now on Itch.io! In Dhilly Game 1, you'll need to pass 6 levels to access the incredible service, Dhillyhub!

Controls for Desktop:

Z - Jump

Arrow Keys - Move

Controls for Web:

B - Jump (X on keyboard)

Arrows - Move

Check out the hilarious Dhilly Game discord server - https://discord.gg/Hd7tYP2Vyh

Original Dhilly Game site - https://sites.google.com/view/dhillygamecollection/

And for more builds of the game please check out the game on Gamejolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/dhilly/642057
